translations: v.把……做成花环；给……戴上花环（garland 的三单形式）

sentences.sentence: They wore blue silk dresses with cream sashes and garlands of summer flowers in their hair.
sentences.translation: 她们穿着配有米色腰带的蓝色丝质连衣裙，头上戴着夏季的花儿编成的花环。

sentences.sentence: Every room smelled of pine; the entire house was adorned with thistle; garlands wound around every banister.
sentences.translation: 每个房间里都有松枝的香味；整个屋子都用蓟装饰；花环缠绕着每段栏杆。

sentences.sentence: Every room smelled of pine; the entire house was adorned with thistle; garlands wound around every banister.
sentences.translation: 每个房间里都有松枝的香味；整个屋子都用蓟装饰；花环缠绕着每段栏杆。
